metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3739 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Chromad in Google Chrome onChromeOS prior to 115.0.5790.131 allowed a remote attacker to executearbitrary code via a crafted shell script. (Chromium security severity:Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
